content: How sanctimonious. I met several people at the women’s marches yesterday who had also already marched… in the civil rights movement of the 60s, in ACT UP, in the climate change march, in a dozen other causes. They too, were derided by their so-called allies. But they never thought that staying home and yelling I told you so made them a better person. March or don’t march, just reconsider your smug tone.
